laboratory_examinations.findings: Severe GHD, mild central hypothyroidism, possible LH/FSH deficiency in Patient 1. GHD with undetectable IGF-I in Patient 2.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient 1's growth velocity increased to 22 cm/y after commencing rhGH treatment. Patient 2's growth velocity increased from 6.6 cm/y to 15 cm/y after treatment.

laboratory_examinations.date: Patient 1: Not specified; Patient 2: 2 months and 20 months of age
laboratory_examinations.findings: Patient 1: Small anterior pituitary, absent pituitary stalk and EPP at the tuber cinereum. Patient 2: Thin corpus callosum, small anterior pituitary, absent pituitary stalk with EPP, and bilateral colobomata.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: MRI findings in Patient 2 showed progression of abnormalities from 2 months to 20 months of age.
